NK020(wa)004:1: // rgyud lung la brten pa'i las bzhi'i sbyin sreg gi
NK020(wa)004:2: ngag 'don bklag chog mar byas pa 'dod ster dbang
NK020(wa)004:3: gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK020(wa)004:5: nam yang mi 'gyur lhun grub phrin las bzhis //
NK020(wa)004:6: kun khyab ris med 'gro ba 'dul mdzad pa //
NK020(wa)004:7: bla ma rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo la //
NK020(wa)004:8: phyag byas rgyud lung las bzhi'i sbyin sreg bri //
NK020(wa)004:9: 'dir sa ga zla ba'i sgrub mchod kyi dus rgyud
NK020(wa)004:10: lung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi la las re sbyar nas
NK020(wa)004:11: spyir las bzhi tshang bar mdzad pa'i sbyin sreg gi
NK020(wa)004:12: cho ga mar bkod pa las /
NK020(wa)004:13: dang po zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ni /
NK020(wa)004:14: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba zhi ba 'bring po'i dkyil 'khor dang sbyar nas ston te /
NK020(wa)004:15: de la thog mar bcas gshom ni /
NK020(wa)004:16: thab stegs gru bzhi pa rgyar khru do dang dpangs
NK020(wa)004:17: su khru phyed pa'i khar dri dkar po dang ba
NK020(wa)004:19: de'i steng ngos kyi mtha' nas zlum skor gyi mu
NK020(wa)004:20: khyud nag po la yig dang seng mgo spel ba'i
NK020(wa)004:21: nang du 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs bzhi pa bri
NK020(wa)004:22: / de'i lte bar thab khung rtsig na rgyar khru
NK020(wa)004:23: gang dang dpangs su khru phyed zlum por bslang ba'i
NK020(wa)004:24: steng nas phyir bkyed pa'i sor bzhi'i tshad can gyi
NK020(wa)004:25: kha khyer bang rim gsum la nang nas rim par
NK020(wa)004:26: 'khor lo lcags kyu 'od phreng gis bskor ba'i dbus
NK020(wa)004:27: su srab 'thug sor gang tsam pa'i thab mtshan 'khor
NK020(wa)004:29: thams cad kyang tshon dkar pos kha bsgyur ro //
NK020(wa)004:31: thab stegs bri rtsig gang byas kyang rung zhing /
NK020(wa)004:32: gzhi'i 'khor lo seng spel ba'i mu khyud dang bcas
NK020(wa)004:33: pa bri dus kha khyer gyi 'og tu tshud pas
NK020(wa)004:35: gzhan thams cad sngar dang 'dra bar rdul tshon dkar pos bri bar bya'o //
NK020(wa)004:36: gang ltar yang 'o ma can gyi shing rtse mo'i
NK020(wa)004:37: cha las byung ba'am dgon pa'i ba lci skam po
NK020(wa)004:38: srog chags med pas thab nang du thab las cung
NK020(wa)004:39: zad dma' ba zlum por brtsigs pa'i shar lhor me
NK020(wa)004:40: tshang bca' / stegs bu'i grwar mda' bzhi btsugs pa
NK020(wa)004:41: srad bu dkar pos bsnol mar bran cing steng nas
NK020(wa)004:43: stegs bu'i shar lho'i zur du mda' dar dmar po gzug /
NK020(wa)004:44: thab kyi mdun du stan dkar zhing 'jam pa dang /
NK020(wa)004:45: de'i g.yas g.yon du khru gang ba'i tshad kyi rdzas
NK020(wa)004:46: stegs dang mchod stegs dkar po ste gsum ka la
NK020(wa)004:47: sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa re bri /
NK020(wa)004:48: stan gyi mdun du zheng mtho gang dang dpangs slob
NK020(wa)004:49: dpon gyi sked pa tsam sleb pa me yol gangs
NK020(wa)004:51: g.yas phyogs rdzas stengs kyi pad+ma'i lte bar las byung
NK020(wa)004:52: ba'i mar khu dgang blugs kyi gzar bu kha sbyar
NK020(wa)004:54: mdun gyi 'dab mar 'o ma can gyi rtse mo'i
NK020(wa)004:55: cha las byung ba'i yab shing mtho gang ba rtse
NK020(wa)004:57: pad 'dab lhag ma bdun la til dkar /
NK020(wa)004:59: nas dkar dang 'bras dkar gyi chan sogs kha zas dkar po dang /
NK020(wa)004:60: tsan+dana dkar po sogs dri dkar po'i rigs dang /
NK020(wa)004:61: tsam pa ka sogs me tog dkar po'i rig te
NK020(wa)004:62: thams cad rang bzhin nam bcos pas dkar ba 'das
NK020(wa)004:63: ma 'das kyi khyad par gyis phyi nang nyis rim
NK020(wa)004:64: dang / thugs dam bskul ba'i rdzas yungs kar rnams rin po che dkar po'i snod du bsham /
NK020(wa)004:65: g.yon phyogs mchod stegs kyi pad+ma'i lte bar /
NK020(wa)004:66: 'o ma 'bras chan dngul phye me tog dkar po
NK020(wa)004:67: rnams dang bsres pa'i mar dkar gyi 'das gtor zlum
NK020(wa)004:68: po ril bu drug gis bskor ba many+dzi'i steng bkod
NK020(wa)004:69: pa'i mdun du rgyu de las 'jig rten pa'i gtor
NK020(wa)004:70: ma dkar zlum / mdun gyi pad 'dab la rdor dril /
NK020(wa)004:71: de'i g.yas g.yon gyi 'dab mar sman raka /
NK020(wa)004:72: pad 'dab lhag ma lnga la zhabs bsil dang bzhi
NK020(wa)004:73: bsnol gyi mchod rdzas rang bzhin nam bcos pas dkar
NK020(wa)004:74: ba g.yas bskor du bsham zhing /
NK020(wa)004:75: las bum yang ci bder bzhag go //
NK020(wa)004:76: de ltar shoms zin nas cho ga ni /
NK020(wa)004:77: slob dpon chas gos dang rin po che'i rgyan dkar
NK020(wa)004:78: pos brgyan la rdo rje'i skyil krung gis shis pa'i
NK020(wa)004:79: phyogs su kha bltas pas 'dug nas /
NK020(wa)004:80: don gyi sems chos thams cad kyi gshis lugs lhag
NK020(wa)004:81: pa bden pa dbyer med kyi lta ba rtogs shing
NK020(wa)004:82: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas /
NK020(wa)004:83: kun slong stongs kyi sems rang gzhan gyi gnod sdig
NK020(wa)004:84: sel bar 'dod pa'i sems zhi zhing dang pa'i sgo
NK020(wa)004:85: nas / ngag sngags rnams phra zhing zhi la rgyun
NK020(wa)004:86: mi chad par bzla ba'i tshul gyis cho ga'i las
NK020(wa)004:87: nas / la 'jug ste / dzi na dzika phata dzah zhes pas /
NK020(wa)004:88: rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo las mar me
NK020(wa)004:89: gcig las gnyis mched kyi tshul du rnam snang dkar
NK020(wa)004:90: po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i rnam pas 'thon nas
NK020(wa)004:91: dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo'i thad du 'khod de sbyin
NK020(wa)004:92: sreg gi las rim la 'jug par mos la /
NK020(wa)004:93: rdo rje thabs kyi rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i ngo bo dang /
NK020(wa)004:94: dril bu shes rab kyi rang bzhin stong nyid chos kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa /
NK020(wa)004:95: gnyis ka'ang don dam pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du mos pa brtan par byas la /
NK020(wa)004:97: gis rdo rje gsor zhing thugs kar 'dzin /
NK020(wa)004:98: badz+ra g+nan+de +aahs dril bu bkrol zhing dkur brten /
NK020(wa)004:99: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK020(wa)004:100: zhes 'khyud rgya byas te dam tshig gsum dran par bya'o //
NK020(wa)004:101: de nas phyi mchod rnams sgrub thabs ltar brlab cing /
NK020(wa)004:102: sman raka gnyis sngags tsam gyis byin rlabs gso /
NK020(wa)004:103: las gtor dang sreg rdzas rnams la las bum gyi chu 'thor zhing /
NK020(wa)004:104: h+aum big+h+n+aa n+ta krita phata dang /
NK020(wa)004:106: stong pa'i ngang las ma dang a las nyi zla'i
NK020(wa)004:107: ga'u'i snod du rang gi thugs ka nas gtor ma'i
NK020(wa)004:109: sreg rdzas kyi gnas su 'bru lnga spros te 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK020(wa)004:110: zhi ba'i las gtor rin po che'i mchod sdong 'od zer dkar po 'phro ba dang /
NK020(wa)004:111: sreg rdzas rnams ro brgya ldan pa'i zag med ye
NK020(wa)004:112: shes kyi bdud rtsi nam mkha' gang bas zhi ba'i
NK020(wa)004:113: las sgrub pa la thogs pa med pa'i nus pa
NK020(wa)004:117: zhes bzlas pas byin gyis brlabs /
NK020(wa)004:119: stong pa'i ngang las mdun du b+h+r+aum yig 'phro 'dus
NK020(wa)004:120: yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo'i lte ba la
NK020(wa)004:121: gnas pa'i zhi ba'i thab khung dkar zhing zlum pa
NK020(wa)004:122: kha khyer bang rim gsum dang ldan pa 'od zer
NK020(wa)004:124: rang gi thugs ka nas ram yig thab nang du
NK020(wa)004:125: spros pa las ye shes kyi me 'od dkar po
NK020(wa)004:127: ag+ne ye dz+wa la dz+wa la h+aum phata /
NK020(wa)004:128: ces rgyun bzhag gam gtsub shing las byung ba'i me du ba med pa spar la /
NK020(wa)004:129: thab kyi me'i dbus su ma dang dihls byung ba'i
NK020(wa)004:130: nyi ma dang ra skyes kyi gdan la yig dkar
NK020(wa)004:131: po 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las ag+ne de
NK020(wa)004:132: wa ri shi h+aum zhi ba'i me lha dkar po
NK020(wa)004:133: zhi zhing 'dzum pa drang srong gi cha byad can
NK020(wa)004:134: gan+d+he dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'i skur gyur /
NK020(wa)004:135: a dar+sha sogs kyis bskur brlab /
NK020(wa)004:136: thugs ka'i h+aum las 'od zer 'phros pas shar lho nas me lha 'khor bcas bzhengs par bsams la /
NK020(wa)004:137: ag+ne de wa sa ma ya h+aum dzah zhes se gol bsnol mar gdab /
NK020(wa)004:138: mda' dar dmar pos g.yab cing /
NK020(wa)004:140: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NK020(wa)004:141: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
NK020(wa)004:142: me lha drang srong bram ze mchog /
NK020(wa)004:143: 'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol //
NK020(wa)004:145: ag+ne de wa ri shi dzah dzahs spyan drangs /
NK020(wa)004:150: me lha zhal cung zad gdangs pas sreg blugs kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun drangs nas gsol bar bsams la /
NK020(wa)004:151: lag gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur du byas pas dgang blugs bzung nas /
NK020(wa)004:153: zhes g.yas pa'i blugs gzar bdun gyis g.yon pa'i dgang
NK020(wa)004:154: gzar bkang rjes gzar bu kha sbyar te pus mo'i
NK020(wa)004:155: nang las mi 'da' bas g.yas bskor gyis /
NK020(wa)004:156: ag+ne de wa ri shi ha bya ka bya di
NK020(wa)004:157: bya bdag cag dpon slob 'khor dang bcas pa'i nad
NK020(wa)004:158: gdon sdig sgrib bar chad mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams
NK020(wa)004:159: cad sh+aan+tim ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK020(wa)004:160: zhes lan gsum gyis dgang blugs phul /
NK020(wa)004:161: de rjes sngags de kho nas yam shing /
NK020(wa)004:163: sreg rdzas rnams re re nas lnga'am bdun sogs ji ltar rigs pa phul la /
NK020(wa)004:165: tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras //
NK020(wa)004:166: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /
NK020(wa)004:167: 'byung po yongs su skyob pa'i phyir //
NK020(wa)004:168: thugs rje'i dbang gis sku sprul pa //
NK020(wa)004:169: rig sngags grub pa drang srong tshul //
NK020(wa)004:170: nyon mongs sreg pa'i shes rab 'od //
NK020(wa)004:171: bskal pa'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar //
NK020(wa)004:172: mngon shes rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan //
NK020(wa)004:173: thabs kyis sprul pa'i theg pa chibs //
NK020(wa)004:174: bgrang phreng 'dzin cing rig sngags gsungs //
NK020(wa)004:175: bdud rtsi'i bcud can gun+d+he bsnams //
NK020(wa)004:176: chos kyi bdud rtsis yongs la bsil //
NK020(wa)004:177: nyes pa'i skyon bral tshangs par spyod //
NK020(wa)004:179: zhi ba brnyes kyang thugs rje che //
NK020(wa)004:180: de la bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
NK020(wa)004:184: rig pa'i rgyal po khyod kyis las thams cad byed pas sreg rdzas lha'i zhal du 'bul ba dang /
NK020(wa)004:185: me nyid ye shes kyi mer byin gyis brlabs nas
NK020(wa)004:186: bdag cag dpon slob 'khor dang bcas pa'i nad gdon
NK020(wa)004:187: sdig sgrib thams cad zhi ba'i phrin las mdzad du
NK020(wa)004:189: de dag sbyin lha ste 'jig rten pa'i lha mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
NK020(wa)004:190: de nas sreg lha zhes pa 'das pa'i me lha mchod pa ni /
NK020(wa)004:191: me lha'i lto ba yangs shing rgya che ba'i dbus
NK020(wa)004:192: su b+h+r+aum yig 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las
NK020(wa)004:193: / b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he ye shes rin po
NK020(wa)004:194: che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa
NK020(wa)004:196: ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te //
NK020(wa)004:198: nyi zla pad+ma rin po che //
NK020(wa)004:199: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsal btab la //
NK020(wa)004:200: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs shing //
NK020(wa)004:201: rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil //
NK020(wa)004:203: tshogs mchog dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol //
NK020(wa)004:204: e h+ye hi +aa na ya dzah h+aum bam hoh
NK020(wa)004:205: zhes pas sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams
NK020(wa)004:206: cad las kyi rdo rjes so so'i sngags brjod cing
NK020(wa)004:207: man+dala me tog gis mtshon par spyan drangs pa slob
NK020(wa)004:208: dpon la g.yas su bskor te g.yon phyogs nas phul
NK020(wa)004:209: ba las me tog thab tu dor ba dang mnyam
NK020(wa)004:213: sogs so so'i sngags brjod pas /
NK020(wa)004:214: bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
NK020(wa)004:215: te bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
NK020(wa)004:216: lha tshogs thams cad sku mdog dkar po g.yas 'khor
NK020(wa)004:217: lo dang g.yon rang rtags 'chang ba so so'i gdan
NK020(wa)004:218: la bzhugs pa'i sku las 'od zer dkar po phreng
NK020(wa)004:219: ba mkha' khyab tu spro bas zhi ba'i phrin las
NK020(wa)004:221: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul //
NK020(wa)004:223: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub //
NK020(wa)004:224: ces pa'i bar sku mdog ston pa'i rkang pa gnyis dor bas gsal btab la /
NK020(wa)004:228: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi ljags rdo rje 'od
NK020(wa)004:229: kyi spu gu can gyis sreg blugs kyi bdud rtsi'i
NK020(wa)004:230: rgyun drangs nas gsol bar bsams la /
NK020(wa)004:232: ces bdun gyis bkang ba'i dgang blugs kha sbyar ba /
NK020(wa)004:233: lung las bshad pa'i zhi ba zhe gnyis kyi spyi sngags /
NK020(wa)004:234: bod+hi tsit+ta ma h+aa su kha dz+ny+aa na d+h+aa tu
NK020(wa)004:235: +aah zhes pa'i mthar spel tshig sngar ltar btags pas
NK020(wa)004:236: lan gsum phul / de nas yam shing mar khu
NK020(wa)004:237: sogs sreg rdzas gzhan rnams lha rang rang gi sngags
NK020(wa)004:238: kyis so sor gtso 'khor gyi 'gros sbyar te 'bul
NK020(wa)004:239: lan gsum phul / ba'am / mi nus na bo
NK020(wa)004:240: d+hitsit+tasa spyir bargya'am nyer gcig tsam bcu tshan re re'i
NK020(wa)004:241: mthar spel tshig sngar ltar sbyar nas 'bul lo //
NK020(wa)004:243: dzi na dzika sa pa ri w+aa ra ma h+aa ba lim ta kh+aa his las gtor dang /
NK020(wa)004:245: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa his sman raka phul nas //
NK020(wa)004:246: phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi //
NK020(wa)004:248: thab khung du yungs kar 'thor zhing //
NK020(wa)004:249: ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du //
NK020(wa)004:250: dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin sreg 'bul //
NK020(wa)004:251: bdag gis zhi ba'i phrin las mthar phyin nas //
NK020(wa)004:252: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par mdzod //
NK020(wa)004:253: ces gsol pa btab pas lha tshogs rnams kyi sku
NK020(wa)004:254: las 'od zer 'phros bsgrub bya la reg pas nad
NK020(wa)004:255: gdon sdig sgrib thams cad zhi bar bsam mo //
NK020(wa)004:256: de nas gtang rag gi mchod bstod dang bzod gsol byas la /
NK020(wa)004:257: sngar ltar me tog gis spyan drangs te /
NK020(wa)004:258: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha tshogs rnams sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor la gshegs /
NK020(wa)004:259: gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa rang la thim par bsam mo //
NK020(wa)004:261: ag+na ye dz+wa la dz+wa la h+aum phata /
NK020(wa)004:262: ces blugs gzar gyi mar khus me gsol te /
NK020(wa)004:263: 'jig rten pa'i me lha sngar bzhin gsal bar bsams la /
NK020(wa)004:264: ag+ne de wa ri shi ha bya sogs kyis sreg rdzas lhag rnams phul /
NK020(wa)004:267: ma h+aa ba lim ta kh+aa hi /
NK020(wa)004:269: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa his las gtor dang sman raka phul /
NK020(wa)004:273: me lha ye shes pa rang gnas su gshegs /
NK020(wa)004:274: dam tshig pa 'bar ba'i rnam par gyur par bsam
NK020(wa)004:275: la las kyi rjes bsdu zhing bsngo shis kyis mtha'
NK020(wa)004:277: gnyis pa rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni /
NK020(wa)004:278: lung a nu yo ga tshogs chen 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang sbyar nas ston te /
NK020(wa)004:279: de la thog mar bcas gshom ni /
NK020(wa)004:280: thab stegs khru do gru bzhi pa dpangs su khru phyed brtsig gam ma brtsig kyang rung ste /
NK020(wa)004:281: de la dri ser po dang ba byung gis chag
NK020(wa)004:282: chag btab pa'i khar thab khung gru bzhi pa rgyar
NK020(wa)004:283: khru gang dang dpangs su khru phyed pa sor bzhi
NK020(wa)004:284: pa'i kha khyer bang rim gsum la nang nas rim
NK020(wa)004:285: par 'od phreng zhags pa rin po che rnams kyis
NK020(wa)004:286: bskor ba'i dbus su thab mtshan rin po che t+r+aam
NK020(wa)004:288: bri rtsig gang byed kyang thams cad kha dog ser por bya zhing /
NK020(wa)004:289: thab nang du bud shing 'bras bu chags pa'am kha
NK020(wa)004:290: dog ser zhing 'o ma can gyi yal ga'i cha
NK020(wa)004:291: las byung bas thab dbyibs su thab las cung zad
NK020(wa)004:292: dma' ba brtsigs pa'i shar lhor me tshang bca' /
NK020(wa)004:293: stegs bu'i grwar mda' bzhi srad bu ser pos bsnol
NK020(wa)004:294: mar bran zhing steng nas me dar ser pos dgab
NK020(wa)004:295: / shar lho'i grwar mda' dar dmar po gzug /
NK020(wa)004:296: thab kyi mdun du slob dpon gyi gdan dang /
NK020(wa)004:297: de'i g.yas g.yon du rdzas mchod kyi stegs te gsum
NK020(wa)004:298: ka ser po la pad+ma 'dab brgyad re re bri
NK020(wa)004:299: / stan gyi mdun du zheng mtho gang dang dpangs
NK020(wa)004:300: slob dpon gyi sked pa tsam sleb pa'i me yol
NK020(wa)004:302: g.yas phyogs rdzas stegs kyi pad+ma'i lte bar rtsi mar
NK020(wa)004:303: gyi mar khu dgang blugs kha sbyar ba dang bcas
NK020(wa)004:304: pa / mdun gyi pad 'dab la rgyu bud shing
NK020(wa)004:305: dang 'dra ba'i yam shing mtho gang brtse gnyis mar
NK020(wa)004:306: pa / khus nyugs pa / pad 'dab lhag ma bdun la mngar gsum dang /
NK020(wa)004:308: mar sbrang gro chan thud sogs kha zas dang /
NK020(wa)004:309: star kha rgun 'bru sogs 'bras bu'i rigs dang /
NK020(wa)004:312: durba sogs rang bzhin nam bcos pas ser por byas
NK020(wa)004:313: pa 'das ma 'das kyi khyad par gyis phyi nang
NK020(wa)004:314: nyis rim dang thugs dam bskul ba'i rdzas yungs kar
NK020(wa)004:315: rnams bkod / g.yon phyogs mchod stegs kyi pad+ma'i lte
NK020(wa)004:316: bar gser phye me tog ser po gro dang rgun
NK020(wa)004:317: 'bru'i phye ldong ros zho rnams mar kha dog ser
NK020(wa)004:318: por bsgyur ba dang bsres pa'i 'das gtor gru bzhi
NK020(wa)004:319: pad 'dab bzhis bskor ba many+dzi la bkod pa'i mdun
NK020(wa)004:320: du rgyu dbyibs kha dog sngar 'dra'i 'jig rten pa'i
NK020(wa)004:321: rnams bkod / gtor ma'ang bkod / mdun gyi 'dab mar rngor dril /
NK020(wa)004:322: de'i g.yas g.yon gyi 'dab mar sman raka /
NK020(wa)004:323: 'dab ma lhag ma lnga la zhabs bsil dang bzhi
NK020(wa)004:324: bsnol gyi mchod rdzas rang bzhin nam bcos pas ser
NK020(wa)004:325: ba g.yas bskor du bsham zhing /
NK020(wa)004:326: las bum yang ci bder bzhag go //
NK020(wa)004:327: de nas cho ga'i las rim ni /
NK020(wa)004:328: slob dpon chas gos ser po gyon zhing rin po
NK020(wa)004:329: che ser po'i rgyan gyis brgyan la mnyam pa'i skyil
NK020(wa)004:330: krung gis shis pa'i phyogs su kha blta bas 'dug
NK020(wa)004:331: nas / don gyi sems dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dbyer
NK020(wa)004:332: med bde ba chen por rtogs shing byang chub kyi
NK020(wa)004:334: stongs kyi sems rang gzhan gyi mthun phyogs rgyas pa
NK020(wa)004:335: la dga' zhing spro ba'i sgo nas ngag sngags rnams
NK020(wa)004:336: gsal zhing 'tsher bar bzla ba'i tshul gyis cho ga'i
NK020(wa)004:338: s+w+aam rat+na d+h+rika phata dzah zhes pas /
NK020(wa)004:339: rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo las mar me
NK020(wa)004:340: gcig las gnyis mched kyi tshul du rin chen 'byung
NK020(wa)004:341: ldan ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i rnam pas
NK020(wa)004:342: 'thon nas dkyil 'khor gyi lho sgo'i thad du 'khor
NK020(wa)004:343: de spyin sreg gi las rim la 'jug par mos
NK020(wa)004:344: pas / rdo rje thabs kyi rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i ngo bo /
NK020(wa)004:345: dril bu shes rab kyi rang bzhin stong nyid chos kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa /
NK020(wa)004:346: gnyis ka'ang don dam pa byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du mos la /
NK020(wa)004:347: ma h+aa badz+ra h+aum gis rdo rje gsor zhing thugs kar 'dzin /
NK020(wa)004:348: badz+ra g+han+de ahs dril bu gsil zhing dkur brten /
NK020(wa)004:349: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko &aham /
NK020(wa)004:350: zhes 'khyud rgya byas te dam tshig gsum dran par bya'o //
NK020(wa)004:351: de nas phyi mchod rnams sgrub thabs ltar brlab cing /
NK020(wa)004:352: sman raka gnyis sngags tsam gyis byin rlabs gsos la /
NK020(wa)004:353: las gtor dang sreg rdzas rnams la las bum gyi chu 'thor zhing /
NK020(wa)004:354: h+aum big+h+n+aan+ta kri ta phata dang /
NK020(wa)004:356: stong pa'i ngang las ma a zhes brjod pas nyi
NK020(wa)004:357: zla ga'u'i snod du rang gi thugs ka nas t+r+aam
NK020(wa)004:358: ser po spros pa 'od zer 'phro 'dus yongs su
NK020(wa)004:359: gyur pa las / rgyas pa'i las gtor rin po
NK020(wa)004:360: che'i mchod sdong 'od zer ser po 'phro ba dang
NK020(wa)004:361: gyur pa las / / sreg rdzas rnams zag med
NK020(wa)004:362: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi 'do yon gyi rnam pa
NK020(wa)004:363: thams cad par 'char ba'i sprin nam mkha' rab 'byams
NK020(wa)004:364: gang bas rgyas pa'i las sgrub pa la thogs pa
NK020(wa)004:365: med pa'i nus pa dang ldan par bsam mo //
NK020(wa)004:367: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum zhes brjod pas mdun du
NK020(wa)004:368: rgyas pa'i thab khung ser po gru bzhi pa kha
NK020(wa)004:369: khyer bang rim gsum ldan 'od zer ser po 'phro
NK020(wa)004:370: bar gyur / rang gi thugs ka nas ram yig
NK020(wa)004:371: thab nang du spros pa las ye shes kyi me
NK020(wa)004:373: ag+na ye dz+wa la dz+wa la h+aum phata /
NK020(wa)004:374: ces rje rigs kyi me'am nor bu las byung ba'i me du ba med pa spar la /
NK020(wa)004:375: thab kyi me'i dbus su nyi ma dang ra skyes kyi gdan la ag+ne de wa ri shi h+aum /
NK020(wa)004:376: zhes brjod pas rgyas pa'i me lha ser po sgeg
NK020(wa)004:377: cing gzi 'bar drang srong gi chas can rin po
NK020(wa)004:378: che'i sgrom bu dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa gsal bar
NK020(wa)004:379: gyur / sa ma t+aa sogs kyis bskur brlab /
NK020(wa)004:380: rang gi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas shar
NK020(wa)004:381: lho nas me lha 'khor bcas bzhengs par bsams la
NK020(wa)004:382: / ag+ne de wa sa ma ya h+aum dzah zhes se gol bsnol mar gdab /
NK020(wa)004:383: mda' dar dmar pos g.yab cing /
NK020(wa)004:385: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis /
NK020(wa)004:386: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
NK020(wa)004:387: me lha drang srong bram ze mchog /
NK020(wa)004:388: 'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol //
NK020(wa)004:390: ag+ne de wa rim shi dzah dzah sa spyan drangs /
NK020(wa)004:396: rin chen rigs las grub pa yi //
NK020(wa)004:397: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /
NK020(wa)004:398: phrin las kun gyi dpang po mdzad //
NK020(wa)004:401: me lha zhal cung zad gdangs pas sreg blugs kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun drangs nas gsol bar bsams la /
NK020(wa)004:402: rin po che'i khu tshur gyis dgang blugs bzung nas mar khu /
NK020(wa)004:404: zhes g.yas blugs gzar bdun gyis g.yon pa'i dgang gzar
NK020(wa)004:405: bkang rjes gzar bu kha sbyar te pus mo'i nang
NK020(wa)004:406: las mi 'da' bas g.yas su bskor zhing /
NK020(wa)004:407: ag+ne de wa rim shi ha bya ka bya di
NK020(wa)004:408: bya ma h+aa na ye di bya bdag cag dpon
NK020(wa)004:409: slob 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshe dang bsod nams ye
NK020(wa)004:410: shes thams cad push+nim ku ru /
NK020(wa)004:411: zhes lan gsum gyis dgang blugs phul /
NK020(wa)004:412: sngags des yam shing dang mar khu sngon 'gros sreg
NK020(wa)004:413: rdzas rnams re re nas lnga'am bdun sogs grangs ji
NK020(wa)004:417: rig pa'i rgyal po khyod kyis las thams cad byed pas sreg rdzas lha'i zhal du 'bul ba dang /
NK020(wa)004:418: me nyid ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs nas bdag
NK020(wa)004:419: cag dpon slob 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshe dang bsod
NK020(wa)004:420: nams ye shes thams cad rgyas pa'i phrin las mdzad
NK020(wa)004:421: du gsol / zhes 'dod don gsol lo //
NK020(wa)004:422: de nas 'das pa'i me lha mchod pa ni /
NK020(wa)004:423: badz+ra dz+ny+aa na dz+wa la ram /
NK020(wa)004:425: me lha nyid thugs rje ye shes kyi me 'bar ba'i rnam par gyur pa'i klong du /
NK020(wa)004:426: b+ha ga gsang ba'i 'od zer las /
NK020(wa)004:427: bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang //
NK020(wa)004:428: nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag tu med //
NK020(wa)004:429: dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings //
NK020(wa)004:430: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he ka p+aa la b+h+r+aum /
NK020(wa)004:431: zhes pa'i sgra gdangs kyi rkyen las steng khang ye
NK020(wa)004:432: shes rin po che dang 'og khang 'bar ba'i gzhal
NK020(wa)004:433: yas khang phyi nang rim pa dgu pa'i lha gnas
NK020(wa)004:434: rnams su so so'i gdan dang bcas pa bkra lam
NK020(wa)004:437: chos sku rigs pa rang snang ba //
NK020(wa)004:438: rdo rje dbyings kyi lha tshogs dang /
NK020(wa)004:439: khams gsum ma lus 'dul ba yi /
NK020(wa)004:441: rdo rje 'chang gral rim brnyes pa'i //
NK020(wa)004:443: smon lam dam tshig tshul bzhin du //
NK020(wa)004:444: gnas 'dir ma lus gshegs su gsol //
NK020(wa)004:445: dzahh+aum bam hoh e h+ye hi ru lu ru lu
NK020(wa)004:446: h+aum b+h+yo dzahdzah zhes pas sgrub mchod kyi dkyil 'khor
NK020(wa)004:447: las lha tshogs thams cad las rdor gyis so so'i
NK020(wa)004:448: sngags brjod cing man+dala me tog gis mtshon par spyan
NK020(wa)004:449: drangs te slob dpon la phul bas me tog thab
NK020(wa)004:450: tu dor te / s+w+aam rat+na d+h+rika m+aam mo ha ra ti /
NK020(wa)004:451: dzi na dzika l+aam dwe sha ra ti /
NK020(wa)004:452: h+aum badz+ra d+h+rika m+aum d+h+aa t+ae shwa r+ai /
NK020(wa)004:453: +aa ro lika sogs zhi sngags dang /
NK020(wa)004:454: rat+na sh+r+ai he ru ka rat+na kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai h+aum /
NK020(wa)004:456: bud+d+ha badz+ra pad+ma sh+r+ai he ru ka sogs nas /
NK020(wa)004:457: ma h+aa gu ru sha ri ram g+ai li h+aum /
NK020(wa)004:458: zhes pa'i bar dkyus ltar te /
NK020(wa)004:459: zhi khro'i sngags thams cad lan re brjod pas /
NK020(wa)004:460: steng khang du bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan
NK020(wa)004:461: la sogs te zhi ba rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil
NK020(wa)004:462: 'khor gyi lha tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang /
NK020(wa)004:463: 'og khang du bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po rat+na
NK020(wa)004:464: he ru ka la sogs te he ru ka yab
NK020(wa)004:465: yum dgu / gnas yul sgo skyong nyi shu /
NK020(wa)004:472: khro bo khro mo drug cu /
NK020(wa)004:473: pho nya nyis brgya bzhi bcu /
NK020(wa)004:474: ma mo drug cu ste bdud 'dul khro bo'i dkyil
NK020(wa)004:475: 'khor gyi lha tshogs dus gsum gyi rig 'dzin bla
NK020(wa)004:476: ma dang bcas pa thams cad kyang sku mdog ser
NK020(wa)004:477: po g.yas rin po che dang /
NK020(wa)004:478: g.yon zhi ba rnams dril bu dang khro bo rnams dung khrag bsnams pa /
NK020(wa)004:479: lha gnas so sor rang rang gi gdan la bzhugs
NK020(wa)004:480: pa'i sku las 'od zer ser po'i phreng ba mkha'
NK020(wa)004:481: khyab tu spro bas rgyas pa'i phrin las mdzad par
NK020(wa)004:485: e ma rang snang dbyer med sku sogs kyis zhi ba dang /
NK020(wa)004:487: nyes bcom legs ldan sogs kyis khro bo la bstod /
NK020(wa)004:488: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi ljags rdo rje 'od
NK020(wa)004:489: kyi spu gu can gyis sreg blugs kyi bdud rtsi'i
NK020(wa)004:490: rgyun drangs nas gsol bar bsams la /
NK020(wa)004:492: ces bdun gyis bkang ba'i dgang blugs kha sbyar ba zhi khro spyi sngags /
NK020(wa)004:493: gu h+ya dz+ny+aa na bo d+hi tsit+ta ma h+aa su kha h+aum h+aum /
NK020(wa)004:495: bdag cag dpon slob sogs btags pas lan gsum phul nas /
NK020(wa)004:496: sngags des yam shing mar khu sreg rdzas rnams rgya'am nyer gcig ji ltar rigs pa phul mthar /
NK020(wa)004:497: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa his bdud rtsi /
NK020(wa)004:499: ma h+aa ba lim ta pra t+ai ts+tsha kh+aa his las gtor /
NK020(wa)004:500: mah+aa rak+ta pra t+ai ts+tsha kh+aa his rak+ta phul la /
NK020(wa)004:502: klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du //
NK020(wa)004:504: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas rnams kyi //
NK020(wa)004:505: tshe dang bsod nams rgyas gyur nas //
NK020(wa)004:506: mchog thun dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK020(wa)004:507: zhes gsol ba btab pas lha tshogs rnams kyi sku
NK020(wa)004:508: las 'od zer gser mdog nyi 'od lta bu 'phros
NK020(wa)004:509: pas bsgrub bya'i tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par bsam
NK020(wa)004:510: mo // de nas gtang rag gi mchod bstod dang bzod gsol byas la /
NK020(wa)004:511: sngar ltar me tog gis spyan drangs te /
NK020(wa)004:512: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha tshogs rnams sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor la gshegs /
NK020(wa)004:513: gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa rang la thim par bsam mo //
NK020(wa)004:515: ag+na ye dz+wa la dz+wa la h+aum phata /
NK020(wa)004:516: ces blugs gzar gyi mar khus me gsos te /
NK020(wa)004:517: 'jig rten pa'i me lha sngar bzhin gsal bar bsams la /
NK020(wa)004:518: ag+ne de wa ri shi ha bya sogs kyis sreg rdzas lhag rnams phul /
NK020(wa)004:520: rin chen rigs sogs kyis bstod /
NK020(wa)004:521: ag+ne de wa ri shi ma h+aa ba lim ta kh+aa his gtor ma phul la 'dod don gsol /
NK020(wa)004:524: me lha ye shes pa rang gnas su gshegs /
NK020(wa)004:525: dam tshig pa 'bar ba'i rnam par gyur par bsam
NK020(wa)004:526: la las kyi rjes bsdu zhing bsngo shis kyis mtha'
NK020(wa)004:528: gsum pa dbang gi sbyin sreg ni /
NK020(wa)004:529: dpal yang dag lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor dang sbyar nas ston te /
NK020(wa)004:530: de la thog mar bcas gshom ni /
NK020(wa)004:531: thab stegs khru do gru bzhi pa dpangs su khru phyed pa rtsig gam ma brtsig kyang rung ste /
NK020(wa)004:532: de la dri dmar po dang ba byung gis chag
NK020(wa)004:533: chag btab pa'i khar stegs bu'i dkyil nas rgyab tu
NK020(wa)004:534: mtho gang tshang bar bzhi cha mdun du 'phags pa
NK020(wa)004:535: nas zlum por bskor ba mdun phyogs kyi zur thig
NK020(wa)004:536: gnyis la reg pa mtshams nas bcad pa'i thab khung
NK020(wa)004:537: zla gam rgyar khru gang dang dpangs su khru phyed
NK020(wa)004:538: pa bslang ba'i steng nas sor bzhi phyir bkyed pa'i
NK020(wa)004:539: mu ran dang / de'i phyi nas sor bzhi gyen du lang pa'i kha khyer bya zhing /
NK020(wa)004:540: bri dus thab dngos khru gang ba'i mthar sor bzhi
NK020(wa)004:541: pa gnyis bskor nas gsum ga'i mdun logs phreng la
NK020(wa)004:542: bcad / bri rtsig gang byed kyang thab kyi lte
NK020(wa)004:543: bar pad+ma dmar po la gnas pa'i gtso bo'i phyag
NK020(wa)004:544: mtshan rdo rje h+aum gis mtshan pa dang /
NK020(wa)004:546: kha khyer la rdo rje dmar po 'od phreng dang bcas pas bskor zhing /
NK020(wa)004:547: stegs bu'i gra bzhir lcags kyu ste /
NK020(wa)004:548: thams cad kyang kha dog dmar por byas la /
NK020(wa)004:549: thab nang du bud shing tsan+dana dmar po seng ldeng
NK020(wa)004:550: mdzo mo shing sogs kha dog dmar ba dang ro
NK020(wa)004:551: skyur ba'i sdong po'i cha las byung bas thab dbyibs
NK020(wa)004:552: su thab las cung zad dma' bar brtsigs pa'i shar
NK020(wa)004:554: rang gi g.yas phyogs stegs la gdan dang snod dmar por sreg rdzas ni /
NK020(wa)004:555: yam shing gi rgyu bud shing dang 'dra ba las
NK020(wa)004:556: ring thung mtho gang ba rtse gnyis snum la nyug
NK020(wa)004:557: pa / til mar te bod du sbal kha'i snum /
NK020(wa)004:558: ut+pala dmar po dang glang sna sogs me tog dmar po'i rigs /
NK020(wa)004:559: tsan+dana dmar po sogs dri dmar po'i rigs //
NK020(wa)004:560: ro skyur ba dang kha dog dmar po'i rigs kyi
NK020(wa)004:561: shing dang 'bru 'bras sogs rang bzhin nam bcos pas
NK020(wa)004:562: dmar por byas pa 'das ma 'das kyi rim pa
NK020(wa)004:563: gnyis dang / thugs dam bskul ba'i rdzas yungs dkar nag /
NK020(wa)004:564: g.yon phyogs su mchod stegs dang mchod snod dmar por
NK020(wa)004:565: ar+g+ham dang me tog sogs rnam lnga'i mchod rdzas rang
NK020(wa)004:566: bzhin nam bcos pas dmar por byas pa dang /
NK020(wa)004:567: zangs phye bu ram pad rag 'bras dmar dang ram
NK020(wa)004:568: bu'i phye rnams bsres pa'i mar kha dog dmar por
NK020(wa)004:569: bsgyur ba la 'das ma 'das kyi las gtor zla
NK020(wa)004:570: gam pad 'dab lngas bskor ba gnyis dang /
NK020(wa)004:572: mdun du las bum nang mchod rdor dril dgang blugs rnams dang /
NK020(wa)004:573: me yol zhe mtho gang dpangs su slob dpon gyi
NK020(wa)004:574: sked pa tsam sleb pa la gangs ri bris pa
NK020(wa)004:576: de nas cho ga'i las rim ni /
NK020(wa)004:577: slob dpon chas gos dmar po bstar la pad+ma'i 'dug stangs kyis shis pa'i phyogs su kha bltas te /
NK020(wa)004:578: don gyi sems chos thams cad thugs rang rig pa
NK020(wa)004:579: rang byung gi ye shes zung 'jug bde ba chen
NK020(wa)004:580: po yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid du rtogs
NK020(wa)004:581: shing byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas /
NK020(wa)004:582: stongs kyi sems bsdu bya la chags shing zhen pa'i
NK020(wa)004:583: sgo nas sngags kyi ngag rnams snyan zhing 'gyur khugs
NK020(wa)004:584: su bzla ba'i tshul gyis las la 'jug ste /
NK020(wa)004:585: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka h+aum phata dzah zhes pas /
NK020(wa)004:586: rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i thugs ka nas
NK020(wa)004:587: he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa 'od zer
NK020(wa)004:588: dmar po 'phro ba'i rnam par 'thon te /
NK020(wa)004:589: dkyil 'khor gyi nub sgo'i thad du 'khod nas sbyin sreg gi las 'jug par mos pas /
NK020(wa)004:590: rdo rje ni gtso bo thabs dang /
NK020(wa)004:591: dril bu ni yum shes rab kyi rang bzhin /
NK020(wa)004:592: gnyis ka'ang don dam pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du mos la /
NK020(wa)004:593: ma h+aa badz+ra h+aum gis rdo rje snying gar gsor /
NK020(wa)004:594: badz+ra gan+de ah sa dril bu gsil zhing dkur brten /
NK020(wa)004:595: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa
NK020(wa)004:596: ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko & ham
NK020(wa)004:597: / zhes 'khyud rgya byas te dam tshig gsum dran par bya'o //
NK020(wa)004:598: de nas phyi mchod rnams sgrub thabs ltar byin gyis brlab /
NK020(wa)004:599: sman raka gnyis sngags tsam gyis byin rlabs gso /
NK020(wa)004:600: las gtor dang sreg rdzas rnams la las bum gyi chu 'thor zhing /
NK020(wa)004:603: stong pa'i ngang las ma dang a las nyi zla'i
NK020(wa)004:604: ga'u'i snod du rang gi thugs ka nas h+r+aih dmar
NK020(wa)004:605: spros pa yongs su gyur pa las dbang gi las
NK020(wa)004:606: gtor rin po che'i mchod sdong 'od zer dmar po
NK020(wa)004:607: 'phro ba dang / sreg rdzas rnams rang bzhin gyis
NK020(wa)004:608: dag pa'i bdud rtsi 'dod yon drug gi sprin phung
NK020(wa)004:609: mkha' khyab tu spro bas dbang gi las sgrub pa
NK020(wa)004:610: la thogs pa med pa'i nus pa dang ldan par
NK020(wa)004:611: 'phro ba dang / gyur / de nas me thab bsang sbyangs /
NK020(wa)004:612: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+rum las dbang gi thab khung
NK020(wa)004:613: dmar po zla gam mu ran kha khyer dang bcas
NK020(wa)004:614: pa 'od zer dmar po 'phro bar gyur /
NK020(wa)004:615: rang gi thugs ka nas ram yig thab nang du
NK020(wa)004:616: spros pa las ye shes kyi me 'od dmar po
NK020(wa)004:618: ag+na ye dz+wa la dz+wa la phata /
NK020(wa)004:619: ces smad tshong ma las byung ba'i me du ba med pa sbar la /
NK020(wa)004:620: thab kyi me'i dbus su zangs kyi ra skyes la
NK020(wa)004:621: gnas pa'i dbang gi me lha dmar po zhal bzhi
NK020(wa)004:622: khro 'dzum chags pa drang srong gi cha byad can
NK020(wa)004:623: phyag bzhi'i g.yas gnyis lcags kyu dang bgrang phreng g.yon
NK020(wa)004:624: gnyis dbyug pa dang gun+d+he bsnams pa'i skur gyur /
NK020(wa)004:625: rang gi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas shar
NK020(wa)004:626: lho nas me lha 'khor bcas bzhengs par bsam la
NK020(wa)004:628: ye shes spyan gyi spyod yul nas //
NK020(wa)004:629: me lha drang srong 'khor dang bcas //
NK020(wa)004:630: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NK020(wa)004:631: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs me lha'i gtso //
NK020(wa)004:632: sems can don la dam tshig dgongs //
NK020(wa)004:634: dzahh+aum bam hoh ag+ne dz+ny+aa na sat+wa e h+ye hi
NK020(wa)004:635: b+ha ga w+aan ma h+aa k+aa ru ni ka dri
NK020(wa)004:636: sh+ya hoh sa ma ya s+t+wam zhes pas spyan drangs
NK020(wa)004:637: / ag+na ye sa ma ya tish+tha lhan gyis gnyis med du bstims nas bzhugs su gsol /
NK020(wa)004:638: ag+na ye a la la hoh a ti pu hoh pra ti pu hohs phyag byas la /
NK020(wa)004:639: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /
NK020(wa)004:640: ra skyes chibs shing glog las mgyogs //
NK020(wa)004:641: sreg rdzas kun gyi phyag tshang mdzad //
NK020(wa)004:642: tshim byed khyod la mchod pa 'bul //
NK020(wa)004:646: neewi d+ye kha kha kh+aa hi /
NK020(wa)004:648: me lha zhal cung zad gdangs bas sreg blugs kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun drangs nas gsol bar bsams la /
NK020(wa)004:649: pad+ma'i khu tshur gyis gzar bu gnyis bzung nas til mar /
NK020(wa)004:651: zhes g.yas pas blugs gzar bdun gyis dgang gzar bkang
NK020(wa)004:652: ba kha sbyar te pus mo'i nang las mi 'da'
NK020(wa)004:654: na mahs man+ta bud+d+ha n+aam bi ma le ag+na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK020(wa)004:655: bdag cag dpon slob 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis
NK020(wa)004:656: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad w+aa sham ku
NK020(wa)004:657: ru hoh zhes lan gsum gyis dgang blugs phul nas
NK020(wa)004:658: / pra ti ha ta badz+ra ye s+w+aa h+aa sa yam shing dang /
NK020(wa)004:659: ag+na ye s+w+aa h+aa sa mar nag /
NK020(wa)004:660: na mahs man+ta sogs dgang blugs kyi sngags de kho
NK020(wa)004:661: nas sreg rdzas gzhan rnams lnga'am bdun sogs grangs ji
NK020(wa)004:664: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /
NK020(wa)004:665: bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i phyag bzhi pa //
NK020(wa)004:666: zhal bzhis las bzhi grub par byed //
NK020(wa)004:667: las kun mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK020(wa)004:669: yungs kar nag thab tu 'thor zhing /
NK020(wa)004:670: na mo rig pa'i rgyal po khyod kyis las thams cad byed pas /
NK020(wa)004:671: sreg rdzas lha'i zhal du 'bul ba dang /
NK020(wa)004:672: de nyid ye shes kyi mer byin gyis brlabs nas
NK020(wa)004:673: bdag cag dpon slob 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis
NK020(wa)004:674: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad dbang du 'dus
NK020(wa)004:675: pa'i phrin las mdzad du gsol /
NK020(wa)004:677: de nas 'das pa'i me lha mchod pa ni /
NK020(wa)004:678: badz+ra dz+ny+aa na dz+wa la ram zhes pas me lha
NK020(wa)004:679: nyid thugs rje ye shes kyi me 'bar ba'i rnam
NK020(wa)004:680: par gyur pa'i klong du b+h+rum yig 'od du zhu
NK020(wa)004:681: ba las / b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he badz+ra b+hany+dza
NK020(wa)004:682: dz+ny+aa na man+da la b+h+r+aum zhes pas dur khrod chen
NK020(wa)004:683: po'i gzhal yas khang nang ma zla gam dmar nag
NK020(wa)004:684: ba las / sgo gcig pa / bar khyams gru
NK020(wa)004:685: bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs dang bcas pa'i dbus su
NK020(wa)004:686: lha so sor rang gi gdan ji lta ba bzhin
NK020(wa)004:689: ye shes spyan gyi spyod yul nas //
NK020(wa)004:691: sems can don ldan dam tshig dgongs //
NK020(wa)004:692: gnas 'dir ma lus gshegs su gsol //
NK020(wa)004:693: dzah h+aum bam hoh sh+r+ai he ru ka dri sh+ya hoh sa ma ya hoh sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK020(wa)004:694: badz+ra +aa ra li hoh hrim h+r+aim /
NK020(wa)004:695: zhes pas sgrub mchod kyi dkyil 'khor las lha tshogs
NK020(wa)004:696: rnams las rdor gyis so so'i sngags dang bcas man+dala
NK020(wa)004:697: me tog gis mtshan par spyan drangs te slob dpon
NK020(wa)004:698: la phul ba las me tog thab tu dor bzhin
NK020(wa)004:699: du / ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka sogs so so'i sngags rnams brjod pas /
NK020(wa)004:700: lha tshogs rnams rang rang gi gdan la bzhugs pa ni /
NK020(wa)004:701: dbus su bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po sku mdog
NK020(wa)004:702: mthing nag 'bar ba chen po'i 'od zer can sogs
NK020(wa)004:703: nas / ye shes kyi me dpung rab tu 'bar zhing 'khrugs pa'i dbus na bzhugs pa'o //
NK020(wa)004:704: shar du dkar mo mthing ga g.yas zhing dbyug 'phyar zhing /
NK020(wa)004:706: g.yon brkyang gi stabs kyis zhing gi stan la rol pa /
NK020(wa)004:707: zhes pa'i bar bskyed sngags rnams dor nas brjod pa'i mthar /
NK020(wa)004:708: de ltar gtso 'khor thams cad kyi sku las 'od
NK020(wa)004:709: zer dmar po'i phreng ba mkha' khyab tu 'phros bas
NK020(wa)004:710: dbang gi phrin las mdzad par bsal btab la /
NK020(wa)004:712: ar+g+ham me tog bdug spos dang //
NK020(wa)004:713: zhes sogs sh+lo ka gcig gi mthar /
NK020(wa)004:714: rak+ta tsit+ta shod+d+ha ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK020(wa)004:715: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga sngon du 'gro bas /
NK020(wa)004:717: g+ai r+t+ai h+r+ai'i bar gyis ar+g+ham rnam lnga rol mor bcas pas mchod nas /
NK020(wa)004:718: bdag med phyogs bral sogs kyis bstod /
NK020(wa)004:719: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi ljags rdo rje 'od
NK020(wa)004:720: kyi sbu gu can gyis sreg blugs kyi bdud rtsi'i
NK020(wa)004:721: rgyun drangs nas gsol bar bsam la /
NK020(wa)004:722: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka h+aum /
NK020(wa)004:723: zhes bdun gyis bkang ba'i dgang blugs kha sbyar ba /
NK020(wa)004:724: ru lu'i mthar spel tshig sngar ltar sbyar bas lan gsum phul /
NK020(wa)004:725: de nas yam shing sogs rdzas gzhan rnams kyang ru
NK020(wa)004:726: lu kho nas bargya'am nyer gcig sogs bcu tshan lta
NK020(wa)004:727: bu'i mtshams ji ltar rigs par spel tshig sbyar bas
NK020(wa)004:728: 'bul zhing / gzhan yang mnyam sbyor las /
NK020(wa)004:729: dri chu dkar dmar byang chub sems /
NK020(wa)004:730: sha dang glo mchin ba su ta /
NK020(wa)004:731: sgrub phyir dam rdzas tshogs pa dag /
NK020(wa)004:732: rim bzhin du ni dgod par bya //
NK020(wa)004:733: zhes pa ltar lha rang rang gi khyad par gyi
NK020(wa)004:734: dam rdzas sngar dkyil 'khor la bkod yod na de
NK020(wa)004:735: dag kyang skabs 'dir 'bul bar gshad do //
NK020(wa)004:737: sh+r+ai he ru ka ma h+aa ba lim ta kh+aa his las gtod dang /
NK020(wa)004:738: mah+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa hi /
NK020(wa)004:739: ma h+aa rak+ta kh+aa his sman raka kyang phul la /
NK020(wa)004:740: thab tu yungs dkar nag 'thor zhing //
NK020(wa)004:741: ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung 'dir //
NK020(wa)004:742: dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin sreg 'bul //
NK020(wa)004:743: bdag gis 'gro kun dbang du 'dus gyur nas //
NK020(wa)004:744: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par mdzod //
NK020(wa)004:745: ces gsol ba btab pas lha tshogs rnams kyi sku
NK020(wa)004:746: las 'od zer dmar po lcags kyu lta bu 'phros
NK020(wa)004:747: pas / bsgrub bya rnams rang dbang med par dbang du 'dus par bsam mo //
NK020(wa)004:748: de nas gtang rag mchod bstod dang bzod gsol byas la /
NK020(wa)004:749: sngar ltar me tog gis spyan drangs te /
NK020(wa)004:750: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha tshogs rnams sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor la gshegs /
NK020(wa)004:751: gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa rang la thim par bsam mo //
NK020(wa)004:753: ag+na ye dz+wa la dz+wa la h+aum phata /
NK020(wa)004:754: ces blugs gzar gyi mar khus me gsos te /
NK020(wa)004:755: 'jig rten pa'i me lha sngar bzhin gsal bar bsam la /
NK020(wa)004:756: yam shing sogs rdzas lhag ma rnams bsreg /
NK020(wa)004:758: me lha'i rgyal po sogs kyis bstod /
NK020(wa)004:759: na mahs man+ta bud+d+ha n+aam sarba puny+tsa a mri ta
NK020(wa)004:760: ba lim ta ag+na ye s+w+aa h+aas las gtor phul
NK020(wa)004:764: me lha ye shes pa rang gnas su gshegs /
NK020(wa)004:765: dam tshig pa 'bar ba'i rnam par bsam la las
NK020(wa)004:766: kyi rjes bsdu zhing bsngo smon gyis mtha' brgyan par
NK020(wa)004:768: bzhi pa drag po'i sbyin sreg ni /
NK020(wa)004:769: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba khro bo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor dang sbyar nas ston te /
NK020(wa)004:770: de la thog mar bcas gshom ni /
NK020(wa)004:771: thab stegs khru do gru bzhi pa dpangs su khru phyed pa brtsig gam ma brtsigs kyang rung ste /
NK020(wa)004:772: de la dug khrag gis chag chag btab pa'i steng
NK020(wa)004:773: ngos kyi mtha' nas zlum bskor gyi mu khyud nag
NK020(wa)004:774: po la h+aum yig dang thod skam spel ba'i nang
NK020(wa)004:775: du rdo rje rgya gram sngon po ra gdengs pa
NK020(wa)004:776: zur bstan gyi lte bar ngos re re khru gang
NK020(wa)004:777: ba'i thab khung gru gsum dpangs su khru phyed pa
NK020(wa)004:778: slang ba'i steng nas sor bzhi'i tshar can gyi kha
NK020(wa)004:779: khyer bang rim gsum pa la nang nas rim par
NK020(wa)004:780: rdo rje dang dril bu dang 'od phreng gis bskor
NK020(wa)004:781: ba'i dbus su zheng sor bzhi dang rngams su sor
NK020(wa)004:782: gang ba'i thab mtshan rdo rje rwa gdengs pa h+aum
NK020(wa)004:783: gis mtshan pa'o // bris thab byed na dpangs rngams rnams dor bas chog ste /
NK020(wa)004:784: gang ltar yang ro sol la sogs pas kha dog
NK020(wa)004:785: nag po dang sngon pos bsgyur ba'am bri bar bya
NK020(wa)004:786: zhing / thab nang du ni ma pa sogs dug
NK020(wa)004:787: shing dang tsher ma can gyi shing rtsa ba'i cha
NK020(wa)004:788: las byung ba tshil zhun gyis spags pas thab dbyibs
NK020(wa)004:789: dang mthun par thab las cung zad dma' bar brtsigs
NK020(wa)004:790: pa'i shar lhor me tshang bca' /
NK020(wa)004:791: stegs bu'i grwar mda' bzhi srad bu nag pos bsnol
NK020(wa)004:792: mar bran pa'i steng nas me dar sngo nag gang
NK020(wa)004:793: rigs kyis dgab / shar lho'i grwar mda' dar dmar po'ang gzug /
NK020(wa)004:794: thab kyi mdun du slob dpon gyi gdan dang /
NK020(wa)004:795: de'i g.yas g.yon rdzas mchod kyi stegs te /
NK020(wa)004:796: gsum ka nag po la pad+ma 'dab brgyad re re bri /
NK020(wa)004:797: stan gyi mdun du zheng mtho gang dang dpangs slob
NK020(wa)004:798: dpon sked pa tsam sleb pa'i me yol gangs ri
NK020(wa)004:799: bris pa bzhag / g.yas phyogs rdzas stegs kyi pad+ma'i lte bar tshil zhun dang sbyar ba'i ske tshe'am /
NK020(wa)004:800: yungs nag la sogs pa'i mar nag dgang blugs kha sbyar ba dang bcas pa /
NK020(wa)004:801: mdun gyi pad 'dab la rgyu bud shing dang 'dra
NK020(wa)004:802: ba'i yam shing rtsang gzugs mtho gang ba rtse gnyis
NK020(wa)004:804: pad 'dab lhag ma bdun la nub re bzhin tshogs
NK020(wa)004:805: tha ma'i dus bsgral ba'i ling ro zur du bsags
NK020(wa)004:809: ba glang la sogs pa'i sha sna tshogs /
NK020(wa)004:813: nim pa'i lo ma sogs dug shing dang tsher ma can gyi shing ste /
NK020(wa)004:814: de sogs tsha zhing rtsu ba pa'i rigs rnams rang
NK020(wa)004:815: bzhin nam bcos pas nag pa 'das ma 'das kyi
NK020(wa)004:816: khyad par gyis phyi nang nyis rim dang /
NK020(wa)004:817: thugs dam bskul ba'i rdzas yungs nag rnams thod pa'am lcags snod du bsham /
NK020(wa)004:818: g.yon phyogs mchod stegs kyi pad+ma'i lte bar dug sna /
NK020(wa)004:823: sran chan rnams dur sol gyis bsgyur ba'i mar nag
NK020(wa)004:824: po dang bsres pa'i rgyu las 'das gtor gru gsum
NK020(wa)004:825: mtheb kyu zur gsum pa gsum gyis bskor ba many+dzi
NK020(wa)004:826: la bkod pa'i mdun du rgyu dbyibs kha dog sngar
NK020(wa)004:827: 'dra'i 'jig rten pa'i las gtor kyang bkod /
NK020(wa)004:829: de'i g.yas g.yon gyi 'dab mar sman raka /
NK020(wa)004:830: pad 'dab lhag ma lnga la zhabs bsil dang bzhi
NK020(wa)004:831: bsnol gyi mchod rdzas rang bzhin nam bcos pas nag
NK020(wa)004:832: pa lcags snod la sogs par bsham zhing las bum
NK020(wa)004:834: de nas cho ga'i las rim ni /
NK020(wa)004:835: slob dpon chas gos nag po gyon la rus sbal
NK020(wa)004:836: gyi 'dug stangs kyis shis pa'i phyos su kha bltas
NK020(wa)004:837: te / don gyi sems 'ching grol med pa'i gnas
NK020(wa)004:838: lugs lhag pa bden pa dbyer med kyi lta ba
NK020(wa)004:839: rtogs shing byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas /
NK020(wa)004:840: stongs kyi sems bsgral bya'i yul ma rungs pa la
NK020(wa)004:841: zhe sdang khros pa'i sgo nas sngags kyi ngang rtsub
NK020(wa)004:842: cing 'jigs par bzla ba'i tshul gyis las la 'jug
NK020(wa)004:843: ste / badz+ra sh+r+ai he ru ka h+aum phata dzah zhes pas /
NK020(wa)004:844: rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo las mar me
NK020(wa)004:845: gcig las gnyis mched kyi tshul du badz+ra he ru
NK020(wa)004:846: ka mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i rnam pas
NK020(wa)004:847: thon nas dkyil 'khor gyi byang sgo'i thad du 'khod
NK020(wa)004:848: de sbyin sreg gi las rim la 'jug par mos
NK020(wa)004:849: pas / rdo rje thabs kyi rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i ngo bo dang /
NK020(wa)004:850: dril bu shes rab kyi rang bzhin stong nyid chos kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa dang /
NK020(wa)004:851: gnyis ka'ang don dam pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du mos la /
NK020(wa)004:852: ma h+aa badz+ra h+aum gis rdo rje gsor zhing thugs kar 'dzin /
NK020(wa)004:853: badz+ra g+han+de ahs dril bu bsil zhing dkur brten /
NK020(wa)004:854: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&aham /
NK020(wa)004:855: zhes 'khyud rgya byas te dam tshig gsum dran par bya'o //
NK020(wa)004:856: de nas phyi mchod rnams sgrub thabs ltar brlab cing /
NK020(wa)004:857: sman raka gnyis sngags tsam gyis byin rlabs gsos la /
NK020(wa)004:858: las gtor dang sreg rdzas rnams la las bum gyi chu 'thor zhing /
NK020(wa)004:861: stong pa'i ngang las a dang ma las nyi zla'i
NK020(wa)004:862: ga'u'i snod du rang gi thugs ka nas gtor ma'i
NK020(wa)004:864: sreg rdzas kyi gnas su h+aum yig lnga spros te
NK020(wa)004:865: 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las drag po'i las
NK020(wa)004:866: gtor rin po che'i mchod sdong 'od zer nag po
NK020(wa)004:867: 'phro ba dang / sreg rdzas rnams ngo bo dgra
NK020(wa)004:868: bgegs kyi sha khrag la rnam pa zag med ye
NK020(wa)004:869: shes kyi bdud rtsi nam mkha' gang bas drag po'i
NK020(wa)004:870: las sgrub pa la thogs pa med pa'i nus pa
NK020(wa)004:874: zhes bzlas pas byin gyis brlabs /
NK020(wa)004:875: de nas me thab bsang sbyangs /
NK020(wa)004:876: stong pa'i ngang las mdun du b+h+r+aum yig 'phro 'dus
NK020(wa)004:877: yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rgya gram rwa
NK020(wa)004:878: gdengs pa can gyi lte ba la gnas pa'i drag
NK020(wa)004:879: po'i thab khung nag po gru gsum pa kha khyer
NK020(wa)004:880: bang rim gsum ldan 'od zer nag po 'phro bar
NK020(wa)004:881: gyur / rang gi thugs ka nas ram yig thab
NK020(wa)004:882: nang du spros pa las ye shes kyi me 'od
NK020(wa)004:884: ag+na ye dz+wa la dz+wa la h+aum phata /
NK020(wa)004:885: ces ro bsregs pa'i me'am gdol bshan gyi mes sbar la /
NK020(wa)004:886: thab kyi me'i dbus su ma dang dihls byung ba'i
NK020(wa)004:887: nyi ma dang ra skyes kyi gdan la h+aum yig
NK020(wa)004:888: nag po 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las ag+ne
NK020(wa)004:889: de wa ri shi h+aum drag po'i me lha mthing
NK020(wa)004:890: nag khro zhing gtum pa drang srong gi cha byad
NK020(wa)004:891: can tri sh+aul dang bgrang 'phreng 'dzin pa'i skur gyur
NK020(wa)004:892: / sh+au nya t+aa sogs kyis bskur brlab /
NK020(wa)004:893: thugs ka'i h+aum las 'od zer 'phros pas shar lho nas me lha 'khor bcas bzhengs par bsam la /
NK020(wa)004:894: ag+ne de wa sa ma ya h+aum dzah zhes se gol bsnol mar gdab /
NK020(wa)004:895: mda' dar dmar po g.yab cing /
NK020(wa)004:897: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NK020(wa)004:898: tshur gshegs tshul gshegs 'byung po che //
NK020(wa)004:899: me lha drang srong bram ze mchog /
NK020(wa)004:900: 'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol //
NK020(wa)004:901: lcags kyu'i rgya dang bcas pas /
NK020(wa)004:902: ag+ne de wa ri shi dzahdzah sa spyan drangs /
NK020(wa)004:907: me lha zhal shin tu gdangs pas sreg blugs kyi bdun rtsi'i rgyun drangs nas gsol bar bsams la /
NK020(wa)004:908: khro bo'i khu tshur gyis gzar bu bzung nas /
NK020(wa)004:910: zhes g.yon pa'i blugs gzar bdun gyis g.yas pa'i dgang
NK020(wa)004:911: gzar bkang rjes kha sbyar te pus mo'i phyi las
NK020(wa)004:912: nang du mi 'da' bas g.yon du bskor zhing /
NK020(wa)004:913: ag+ne de wa ri shi ha bya ka bya di
NK020(wa)004:914: bya ma h+aa na ye di bya bdag cag dpon
NK020(wa)004:915: slob 'khor dang bcas pa la gnod cing 'tshe ba'i
NK020(wa)004:916: dgra bgegs gdug pa can thams cad m+aa ra ya
NK020(wa)004:917: phata / ces lan gsum gyis dgang blugs phul /
NK020(wa)004:918: de rjes sngags de kho nas yam shing mar nag
NK020(wa)004:919: sreg rdzas lnga'am bdun sogs grangs ji ltar rigs pa
NK020(wa)004:921: tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras //
NK020(wa)004:922: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /
NK020(wa)004:923: 'byung po yongs su skyob pa'i phyir //
NK020(wa)004:924: thugs rje'i dbang gis sku sprul pa //
NK020(wa)004:925: rig sngags grub pa drang stong tshul //
NK020(wa)004:926: nyon mongs bsreg pa'i shes rab 'od //
NK020(wa)004:927: bskal pa'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar //
NK020(wa)004:928: mngon shes rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan //
NK020(wa)004:929: thabs kyi sprul pa theg pa chibs //
NK020(wa)004:930: bgrang phreng 'dzin cing rigs sngags gsungs //
NK020(wa)004:931: bdud rtsi'i bcud ldan gun+d+he bsnams //
NK020(wa)004:932: chos kyi bdud rtsi yongs la bsil //
NK020(wa)004:933: nyes pa'i skyon bral tshangs par spyod //
NK020(wa)004:935: zhi ba brnyes kyang thugs rje che //
NK020(wa)004:936: de la bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
NK020(wa)004:940: rig pa'i rgyal po'i khyod kyis las thams cad byed pas sreg rdzas lha'i zhal du 'bul ba dang /
NK020(wa)004:941: me nyid ye shes kyi mer byin gyis brlabs nas
NK020(wa)004:942: bdag cag dpon slob 'khor dang bcas pa la gnod
NK020(wa)004:943: cing 'tshe ba'i dgra bgegs gdug pa can thams cad
NK020(wa)004:944: rdul du rlog pa'i phrin las mdzad du gsol //
NK020(wa)004:946: de nas 'das pa'i sreg lha mchod pa ni /
NK020(wa)004:947: me lha'i lto ba yangs shing rgya che ba'i dbus su b+h+r+aum yig 'phro 'dus yongs su gyurpa las /
NK020(wa)004:948: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he ye shes rin po che'i
NK020(wa)004:949: rang bzhin b+hany+dza 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang gru bzhi
NK020(wa)004:950: sgo bzhi pa / phyi nang nyis rim 'bar ba'i
NK020(wa)004:951: bar khyams gnyis dang ldan pa'i lha gnas rnams su
NK020(wa)004:952: so so'i gdan dang bcas pa gsal bar gyur /
NK020(wa)004:955: dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung /
NK020(wa)004:956: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsal btab la /
NK020(wa)004:958: he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang //
NK020(wa)004:959: dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas //
NK020(wa)004:961: dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru //
NK020(wa)004:962: zhing chen gsar rnying stan du bting //
NK020(wa)004:963: dmar gyi ar+g+ham rgya mtshor bskyil //
NK020(wa)004:964: ma lus gshegs nas bsnams su gsol //
NK020(wa)004:966: e h+ye hi +aa na ya dzahh+aum bam hoh zhes
NK020(wa)004:967: pas sgrub mchod kyi dkyil 'khor las lha tshogs thams
NK020(wa)004:968: cad las kyi rdo rjes so so'i sngags brjod cing
NK020(wa)004:969: man+dala me tog gis mtshon par spyan drangs te slob
NK020(wa)004:970: dpon la phul ba las me tog thab tu dor
NK020(wa)004:971: zhing / badz+ra sh+r+ai he ru ka h+aum badz+ra kro d+he shwa r+ai s+t+wam /
NK020(wa)004:973: badz+ra lam b+ho d+ha ra b+h+yo /
NK020(wa)004:975: bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po badz+ra he ru
NK020(wa)004:976: ka la sogs te lnga bcu rtsa brgyad khrag 'thung
NK020(wa)004:977: rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad sku
NK020(wa)004:978: mdog mthing nag g.yas rdo rje dang g.yon rang rtags
NK020(wa)004:979: 'chang ba so so'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i sku las
NK020(wa)004:980: 'od zer nag po'i phreng ba mkha' khyab tu spro
NK020(wa)004:981: bas drag po'i phrin las mdzad par bsam la /
NK020(wa)004:982: smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang /
NK020(wa)004:984: ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas /
NK020(wa)004:985: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsal btab la //
NK020(wa)004:989: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi ljags rdo rje 'od
NK020(wa)004:990: kyi sbu gu can gyis sreg blugs kyi bdud rtsi'i
NK020(wa)004:991: rgyun drangs nas gsol bar bsam la /
NK020(wa)004:992: badz+ra sh+r+ai he ru ka h+aum /
NK020(wa)004:993: zhes bdun gyis bkang ba'i dgang blugs kha sbyar ba /
NK020(wa)004:994: ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h+aum /
NK020(wa)004:995: zhes pa'i mthar spel tshig sngar ltar btags pas lan gsum phul /
NK020(wa)004:996: de nas yam shing dang mar nag sogs sreg rdzas
NK020(wa)004:997: gzhan rnams kyang ru lu kho nas gtso 'khor spyir
NK020(wa)004:998: bargya'am nyer gcig sogs bcu tshan lta bu'i mtshams ji
NK020(wa)004:999: ltar rigs par spel tshig sbrel nas 'bul lo //
NK020(wa)004:1002: ma h+aa ba lim ta kh+aa hi /
NK020(wa)004:1003: btags pas 'das pa'i las gtor dang /
NK020(wa)004:1005: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa his sman raka stob nas /
NK020(wa)004:1007: gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //
NK020(wa)004:1011: ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du //
NK020(wa)004:1012: dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin sreg 'bul //
NK020(wa)004:1013: bdag gis drag po'i phrin las mthar phyin nas //
NK020(wa)004:1014: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par mdzod //
NK020(wa)004:1015: ces gsol ba btab pas lha tshogs rnams kyi sku
NK020(wa)004:1016: las 'od zer nag po me lce lta bur 'phro
NK020(wa)004:1017: ba las mtshon cha'i char babs pas dgra bgegs thams
NK020(wa)004:1019: de nas btang rag gi mchod bstod dang bzod gsol byas la /
NK020(wa)004:1020: sngar ltar me tog gis spyan drangs te /
NK020(wa)004:1021: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha tshogs rnams sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor la gshegs //
NK020(wa)004:1022: gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa rang la thim par bsam mo //
NK020(wa)004:1023: slar yang ag+na ye dz+wa la dz+wa la h+aum phata /
NK020(wa)004:1024: ces blugs gzar gyis mar nag phul bas me gsos te /
NK020(wa)004:1025: 'jig rten pa'i me lha sngar bzhin gsal bar bsam la /
NK020(wa)004:1026: ag+ne de wa ri shi ha bya sogs kyis sreg rdzas lhag rnams phul //
NK020(wa)004:1028: ag+ne de wa ri shi ma h+aa ba lim ta kh+aa hi /
NK020(wa)004:1030: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha his /
NK020(wa)004:1031: las gtor dang sman raka phul /
NK020(wa)004:1035: me lha ye shes pa rang gnas su gshegs /
NK020(wa)004:1036: dam tshig pa 'bar ba'i rnam par gyur par bsams
NK020(wa)004:1037: la las kyi rjes bsdu zhing bsngo shis kyis mtha'
NK020(wa)004:1038: brgyan par bya'o // de ltar sbyin sreg zin nas las kyi mjug bsdu tshul ni /
NK020(wa)004:1039: las bzhi ka 'dra bar me rang zhir 'jug pa'am /
NK020(wa)004:1040: long med na zhi ba la 'o ma dang dri dkar po /
NK020(wa)004:1042: dbang la chang drag po la dug khrag gis gzhi la bar byas nas /
NK020(wa)004:1043: gzhung ltar las so so la shis pa'i gnas su gnon pa'am /
NK020(wa)004:1044: yang na spyi ltar zhi ba dang dbang gi thal ba 'bab chur bskyal /
NK020(wa)004:1046: drag po gzhi mdor mnan par bya'o //
NK020(wa)004:1047: da ni cho ga rgyas bsdus kyi 'dor len dang
NK020(wa)004:1048: don gyi khyad par la dogs pa'i gnas bsam bar
NK020(wa)004:1049: bya ste / de yang rgyun lung la brten pa'i sbyin sreg gi tshul 'di la /
NK020(wa)004:1050: gong ma rnams kyi phyag bzhes su mdo sgyu gnyis
NK020(wa)004:1051: rang rang gi dgos chos khyad par ba ma gtogs
NK020(wa)004:1052: phal cher khog gcig par bi ma la'i gtan tshig
NK020(wa)004:1053: gnyis pa'i sdom tshig dang sbyar te /
NK020(wa)004:1054: don bcu gcig tu bsdus nas 'chad par mdzad mod kyang /
NK020(wa)004:1055: 'dir ni snying po'i le'u nyi shu pa dang /
NK020(wa)004:1056: bshad rgyud rgyas pa sogs las gsungs pa'i rdzas dang
NK020(wa)004:1057: lu gu rgyud kyi sgo nas las bya ba sogs
NK020(wa)004:1058: dor te / sgrub mchod kyi kha skong tsam du
NK020(wa)004:1059: byed pa la chad pa'i skyon med cing zor yang
NK020(wa)004:1060: bas nye bar mkho ba'i dbang du byas nas /
NK020(wa)004:1062: dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan par /
NK020(wa)004:1063: zhal du gyur pa'i me bus la /
NK020(wa)004:1064: bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis //
NK020(wa)004:1065: las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin //
NK020(wa)004:1066: zhes pas dngos su bstan don ji lta ba bzhin
NK020(wa)004:1067: du sreg rkyang gi lugs su byas pa yin la
NK020(wa)004:1068: / gzhan du rgyas pa la mos na /
NK020(wa)004:1069: sgyu d+r+wa'i lugs rje bla ma dam pa'i sku gsung
NK020(wa)004:1070: thugs kyi sras mchog pad+ma 'gyur med rgya mtshos mdzad
NK020(wa)004:1072: 'dus pa mdo'i lugs kho bos zur 'debs dpag bsam
NK020(wa)004:1073: snye ma'i nang du bris pa ltar lag tu blangs
NK020(wa)004:1074: pas chog go // de bzhin du yang dag la'ang
NK020(wa)004:1075: he ru ka gal po'i rgyud du las bzhi so
NK020(wa)004:1076: so'i bskul sngags ring po dag snang na'ang gsang 'grel
NK020(wa)004:1077: gyi sreg chog tu ma bkral bas 'dir yang btang
NK020(wa)004:1079: yang sgrub mchod dang 'brel ba'i tshe 'das pa'i me
NK020(wa)004:1080: lha dam tshig pa mi bskyed par dkyil 'khor la
NK020(wa)004:1081: bzhugs pa'i lha spyan 'dren pa'i lugs 'di yang gsang
NK020(wa)004:1082: sngags pa spyi la grags par ma zad /
NK020(wa)004:1083: slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i yang dag gsang 'grel du
NK020(wa)004:1084: 'das pa'i me lha mchod tshul la man ngag gi
NK020(wa)004:1085: dbye ba gsum du bshad pa'i nang tshan dang po'i
NK020(wa)004:1087: me lha 'od du 'bar nas thab khung ye shes
NK020(wa)004:1088: kyi me 'bar ba'i klong du dkyil 'khor gyi lha
NK020(wa)004:1089: rnams der spyan drangs te mchod par bya zhes rgyud
NK020(wa)004:1090: lung kha gcig las bshad do //
NK020(wa)004:1092: kun mkhyen chen pos phyogs bcu mun sel du'ang /
NK020(wa)004:1093: me lha'i lto bar zhi rgyas gnyis la zhi ba'i lha /
NK020(wa)004:1094: dbang drag la khro bo bskyed pa'am ma bskyed kyang rung ste /
NK020(wa)004:1095: spyan drangs nas bzhugs par gyur pa la /
NK020(wa)004:1096: zhes 'dam kar gsungs pa dang 'byor zhing /
NK020(wa)004:1097: rab gnas kyi tshe yang lha rnams thab khung du
NK020(wa)004:1098: spyan drangs nas sreg blugs kyi mchod pas zhal bsro
NK020(wa)004:1099: ba'i lugs spyir grags pas kyang rjes su dpag nus
NK020(wa)004:1100: pa'i phyir ro // 'di lta'i rtsom tshul mkhas pa'i lugs min yang /
NK020(wa)004:1101: zab gnad 'khrol na de la bstan bcos sgras //
NK020(wa)004:1102: ci snyam dge slong d+harma sh+r+ai yis //
NK020(wa)004:1103: bklags pas bde blag rtogs phyir spel ba yin //
NK020(wa)004:1104: de ltar rgyud lung las bzhi'i sbyin sreg gi //
NK020(wa)004:1105: ngag 'don 'dod ster dbang gi rgyal po 'dis //
NK020(wa)004:1106: 'gro kun bla med chos kyi snod gyur nas //
NK020(wa)004:1107: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob shog /
